message.entry: plot
Creates a 2-D line plot of the data in Y versus the corresponding values in X
A matrix/vector/timeseries, or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size, with an optional linespec
Plot as multiple series
Plots each series on the same plot
Multiple vectors
Plot as multiple series
Plot as multiple series vs. first input
Plots the second and later series against the first series on the same plot
3 or more vectors of the same size
Plot as multiple series vs. first input
plotyy
Graphs with y tick labels on the left and right
4 vectors all of the same length of x1,y1,x2,y2. Y values can also be matrices.
semilogx
Creates x- and y-coordinates using a base 10 logarithmic scale on the x-axis and a linear scale on the y-axis
A vector/matrix, or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size, with an optional linespec parameter
semilogy
Creates x- and y-coordinates using a linear scale on the x-axis and a base 10 logarithmic scale on the y-axis
A vector/matrix, or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size, with an optional linespec parameter
loglog
Creates x- and y-coordinates using a base 10 logarithmic scale on the x-axis and the y-axis
A vector/matrix, or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size, with an optional linespec parameter
area
Creates filled area plot for the values in Y against the x-coordinates X and fills the areas between the curves
A matrix or vector, or 2 matrices or vectors of compatible size with an optional scalar base value
errorbar
Creates a line plot of the data in y and draws a vertical error bar at each data point
2, 3, 4, or 6 vectors or matrices of compatible sizes
errorbar (horizontal)
Horizontal error bar plot
2 to 4 vectors or matrices of compatible sizes
errorbar (horizontal)
plot3
3-D line graph using linear axes
2 to 4 vectors or matrices all of the same size
comet
Creates a comet plot of the data specified in y versus the index of each value
3 vectors/matrices of compatible size with an optional linespec
stem
Discrete sequence or 'stem' plot to display the data sequence, Y, as stems that extends from a baseline along the x-axis
A matrix/vector or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size, with optional 'fill', followed by an optional linespec
stairs
Creates a stairstep graph of the elements in Y
A matrix/vector, or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size, with an optional linespec
stem3
3-D stem plot to display discrete sequence data
3 vectors or matrices of compatible size with optional 'fill' followed by an optional linespec
bar
Creates a bar graph with one bar for each element in y
A single matrix, or a vector of X values and matrix of Y values of compatible size. Either choice with an optional scalar bar width
barh
Horizontal bar graph
A matrix, or a vector of X values and matrix of Y values of compatible size, with an optional scalar bar width
bar3
3-D bar graph
A matrix, or a vector of X values and matrix of Y values of compatible size, with an optional scalar bar width
bar3h
Creates a 3-D horizontal bar graph with one bar for each element in y
A matrix, or a vector of X values and matrix of Y values of compatible size, with an optional scalar bar width
bar (stacked)
Vertical stacked bar graph
A single matrix, or a vector of X values and matrix of Y values of compatible size. Either choice with an optional scalar bar width
bar (stacked)
barh (stacked)
Horizontal stacked bar graph
A single matrix of Y values, or a vector of x values and matrix of Y values of compatible size, followed by an optional scalar bar width
barh (stacked)
histogram
Creates a histogram (type of bar) plot for data grouped into bins
An array with optional scalar number of bins or monotonically non-decreasing vector bin edges, or a categorical array with an optional cell vector or categorical vector of category names
pareto
Creates a pareto chart to display the values in the vector Y as bars drawn in descending order
A vector of y values, with optional vector of x values or cell array of x labels of the same size
plotmatrix
Creates a matrix of subaxes containing scatter plots of the columns of X against the columns of Y
1 or 2 matrices with the same number of rows, followed by an optional linespec
scatter
Creates a scatter/bubble plot with circles at the locations specified by the vectors x and y
A 2-column matrix or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size, followed by an optional size parameter and optional color value
scatter3
Creates a 3-D Scatter plot to display circles at the locations specified by the vectors X, Y, and Z
3 vectors of the same length, followed by an optional scalar or vector area parameter and optional scalar or vector color value
scatter3
bubblechart
Displays colored circular markers (bubbles) at the locations specified by x and y
A 3-column matrix or 3 vectors of the same length, followed by an optional scalar or vector color value
bubblechart3
Displays colored circular markers (bubbles) at the locations specified by x, y, and z in a three-dimensional plot box
4 vectors of the same length, followed by an optional scalar or vector color value
polarbubblechart
Polar bubble chart
A 3-column matrix or 3 vectors of the same length, followed by an optional scalar or vector color value
bubblecloud
Creates a bubblecloud where bubble size is used to show the relationships between values
A non negative numeric vector, with optional string vector of bubble labels and optional categorical vector for grouping bubbles
swarmchart
Displays a scatter plot where points are jittered in the x dimension based on an estimate of the kernel density in the y dimension for each unique x
A 2-column matrix or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size, followed by an optional size parameter and optional color value
swarmchart3
Displays a scatter plot in a 3-D view where points are jittered in the x and y dimensions based on an estimate of the kernel density in the z dimension for each unique combination of x and y
3 vectors of the same length, followed by an optional scalar or vector area parameter and optional scalar or vector color value
spy
Visualize sparsity pattern
1 vector or matrix followed by an optional linespec, followed by an optional scalar marker size
graph
Plots an undirected graph
A graph object
graph
digraph
Plots a directed graph
A digraph object
digraph
pie
Creates a pie chart using the data in X. Each slice of the pie chart represents an element in X
A vector or matrix, with an optional vector or matrix of "explode" parameters and an optional cell array of labels
piechart
Creates a PieChart using the data in X
A vector with an optional vector of "Names"
pie3
Creates a three-dimensional pie chart using the data in X. Each element in X is represented as a slice in the pie chart
A vector or matrix, with an optional vector or matrix of "explode" parameters, and an optional cell array of labels
donutchart
Creates a DonutChart using the data in X
A vector with an optional vector of "Names"
histogram2
Creates a histogram (type of bar) plot for numeric data grouped into 2-D bins
A matrix, or a vector of X values and matrix of Y values of compatible size, with an optional scalar or a two element vector
polarplot
Creates a line in polar coordinates, with theta indicating the angle in radians and rho indicating the radius value for each point
A vector or matrix of angles, with an optional vector or matrix of radii of the same size, followed by an optional linespec
polarhistogram
Creates a histogram plot in polar coordinates by sorting the values in theta into equally spaced bins
A vector or matrix of angles with an optional scalar for number of bins
polarscatter
Displays circles at the locations specified by the vectors TH and R, where TH and R are the same sizes
A vector or matrix of angles, with an optional vector or matrix of radii of the same size, followed by an optional marker size
compass
Creates a compass plot with arrows emanating from origin
Either a matrix or 2 vectors of compatible size followed by an optional linepsec
compassplot
Creates a polar compass plot with arrows emanating from origin
One or two scalars, vectors, or matrices, or a table followed by a pair of table variable indices
geoplot
Creates a line in a geographic axes with vertices at the latitude-longitude locations specified (in degrees) by the vectors lat and lon
2 numeric vectors (latitude and longitude), followed by an optional linespec
geoscatter
Creates colored circles in a geographic axes at the latitude-longitude locations specified (in degrees) by the vectors lat and lon
2 numeric vectors (latitude and longitude), followed by an optional numeric vector (area), followed by an optional numeric vector (color) or colorspec
geobubble
Creates a geographic bubble chart with filled circles (bubbles) representing the geographic locations
Either 2 numeric vectors (latitude and longitude), followed by an optional numeric vector (size), followed by an optional categorical vector (color) or a table with two table subscripts
contour
Contour plot
A matrix, 2 vectors and matrix, or 3 matrices of compatible size. Optionally add a scalar or vector of contour levels and a linespec
contourf
Filled contour plot
A matrix, 2 vectors and matrix, or 3 matrices of compatible size. Optionally add a scalar or vector of contour levels and a linespec
contour3
3-D contour plot
A matrix, 2 vectors and matrix, or 3 matrices of compatible size. Optionally add a scalar or vector of contour levels and a linespec
image
Display image
1 RGB or indexed color array, or 2 vectors and an RGB or indexed color array of compatible size
imagesc
Scale data and display as an image
1 RGB or indexed color array, or 2 vectors and an RGB or indexed color array of compatible size
pcolor
Pseudocolor (checkerboard) plot
1 RGB or indexed color array, or 2 vectors, and an RGB or indexed color array of compatible size
imshow
Display image
Grayscale, logical, truecolor or indexed image array (with colormap). Alternatively, an image file name may be used.
heatmap
Heatmap chart
Table with two or three table subscripts, 2D numeric matrix, or 2 vectors and a 2D numeric matrix
surf
Display a matrix as a surface
1 to 4 x,y,z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size
surfc
Combination surf/contour plot
1 to 4 X,Y,Z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size
surfl
3-D shaded surface with lighting
A Z matrix, or X,Y,Z matrices followed by an optional light source direction vector. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size
mesh
3-D mesh surface
1 to 4 X,Y,Z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size
meshc
Combination mesh/contour plot
1 to 4 X,Y,Z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size
meshz
3-D mesh with curtain
1 to 4 X,Y,Z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size
waterfall
Waterfall plot
1 to 4 X,Y,Z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size
ribbon
Draw 2-D lines as ribbons in 3-D
A Y matrix or X,Y matrices or vectors of the same size followed by an optional scalar width parameter
slice
Volumetric slice plot
A 3 dimensional volume array with 3 vectors defining slice planes
feather
Feather plot
A numeric array, or 2 numeric arrays of the same size, followed by an optional linespec
quiver
Quiver plot
2 or 4 numeric arrays of the same size, followed by an optional scalar value for scale, and an optional linespec
quiver3
3-D quiver plot
4 numeric arrays of the same size, followed by an optional scalar value for scale and an optional linespec
streamslice
Streamlines in slice planes
Either 2 or 4 3-dimensional arrays of the same size, followed by an optional scalar value for scale and an optional linespec
streamline
Streamlines from 2-D or 3-D vector data
A cell array of double arrays produced by stream2 or stream3
fplot
Easy to use function plotter
One or two function handles followed by an optional vector defining a range of x values
fplot3
Easy to use 3-D parametric curve plotter
3 parametric function handles followed by an optional domain range vector
ezpolar
Easy to use polar coordinate plotter
A function handle followed by a optional vector range of theta values
fpolarplot
Plot expression or function in polar coordinates
A function handle followed by an optional polar angle interval (as a two-element vector) and an optional LineSpec string
fcontour
Easy to use contour plotter
A 2-input function handle followed by an optional 2 or 4 element domain vector
fimplicit
Easy to use implicit plotter
A 2-input function handle followed by an optional 2 or 4 element domain vector
fimplicit3
Easy to use 3-D implicit plotter
A 3-input function handle followed by an optional 2 or 6 element domain vector
fsurf
Easy to use 3-D colored surface plotter
One or three 2-input function handles followed by an optional 2 or 4 element domain vector
fmesh
Easy to use 3-D mesh plotter
One or three 2-input function handles followed by an optional 2 or 4 element domain vector
wordcloud
Creates a wordcloud chart from text data
A categorical, string or cellstr array.
stackedplot
Creates a stacked plot of several variables with the common x-axis
One or more tables or timetables. A matrix/N-D array, or a vector and a matrix/N-D array of compatible sizes with more than one row.
scatterhistogram
Creates a scatter plot with marginal histograms
Table with two or three table subscripts, or 2 numeric or categorical vectors
parallelplot
Parallel Coordinates plot
A table or a numeric matrix, with more than one row
Create Chart
Interactively create and explore charts
Creates a binned scatter plot which shows areas of different data density using colors
boxchart
Creates a box chart, or box plot, for the data
A numeric vector or matrix
violinplot
Creates a violin plot for the data
A numeric vector or matrix
Creates a density plot in a geoaxes from locations in degrees specified by the coordinate vectors lat and lon
Creates an animated line with initial data points defined by x, y, and z
3-D Comet-like trajectories
Creates a 3D cone plot showing velocity vectors
Draws stream ribbons from vector volume data U, V, W
Draws stream particles of a vector field
Draws stream tubes from vector volume data U, V, W
